alfredsnippet.snippet:
Journey to the Centre of Uncertainty, R A Lyttleton, Speculations in Science & Technology, Vol. 8, No. 5 p.344

"The remarkable properties of comets are not even remotely explicable by any of the numerous ad hoc assumptions of 'modern' comet theory."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Assumptions of Modern Comet Theory
